Package controller

Class AppManager

java.lang.Object
controller.AppManager
public class AppManager extends Object
Class responsible for managing the application logic.

    • isSerialNumberUnique

      private boolean isSerialNumberUnique(long serialNumber)
      Checks if a given serial number is unique in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number to check.
      Returns:
      True if the serial number is unique, false if it already exists in the inventory.

    • removeToy

      private void removeToy()
      Removes a toy from the inventory based on its serial number.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • categorizeSerialNumber

      private String categorizeSerialNumber(long serialNumber)
      Categorizes a serial number into a toy category based on its first digit.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number to categorize.
      Returns:
      The category of the toy (e.g., "Figure", "Animal", "Puzzle", "BoardGame", or "Unknown").

    • createToy

      private Toy createToy(String category, String[] fields)
      Creates a toy object based on the specified category and field values.
      Parameters:
      category - The category of the toy.
      fields - The array of fields containing toy information.
      Returns:
      A toy object representing the specified category, or null if the category is unknown.

      Returns:
